name: Shiny Eyes
description:
Take Back Our Cliffs

" In the beginning , We and Shiny Eyes Creatures lived together on this cliffs but now they want The whole cliffs for their own  . Use your power to keep our people safe .  You need to find the King but he is on his hidden cliff and his soldiers are everywhere . . . . "

Blue Blender Games

contact  :  BlueBlenderGames@Gmail.com

 << All credits are embedded in the game >>

Download Tips

You need WinRAR or 7Zip to extract the downloaded file. 

Unzip then Extract and  just Double Click on Shiny Eyes.exe  !

Note: This game is for Windows 64-bit versions.
